trans-unit.source: Iterates over all ancestor nodes according to the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath"></xref> ancestor axis rules, and returns the nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: Itera em todos os nós ancestral de acordo com o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath"> </xref> ancestral eixo regras e retorna os nós na ordem inversa de documento.

trans-unit.source: The node from which you start traversing ancestors.
trans-unit.target: O nó do qual você inicia atravessando ancestrais.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter"></xref> class, which enables you to filter nodes based on the name.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter"> </xref> classe, que permite que você filtre nós com base no nome.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if you want the `context` node to be returned as a part of the iteration and not filtered out.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se você quiser que o `context` nó a ser retornado como parte da iteração e não filtrado.
Retorna o navegador de resultados atual.

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: O estado do se navegador alterações somente o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorIterator.MoveNext%2A>método retornou `true`.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Positions the iterator on the next ancestor node.
trans-unit.target: Posiciona o iterador no próximo nó ancestral.

trans-unit.source: If the next ancestor node exists, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se o próximo nó ancestral existir, o método MoveNext define o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorIterator.Current%2A>propriedade para o navegador de resultados atual; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorIterator.Current%2A>propriedade permanece inalterada.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorIterator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the next ancestor node exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o próximo nó ancestral existir. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
